biography: Ross Bagdasarian Jr. was born on October 25, 1949 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Ross Dickran Bagdasarian. He is an actor and producer, known for Alvinnn!!! And the Chipmunks (2015), Alvin & the Chipmunks (1983) and A Chipmunk Christmas (1981). He has been married to Janice Karman since September 27, 1980. They have two children.
name: Ross Bagdasarian, Jr.
